channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Duplicate Page and Post
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Duplicate Page and Post

item.title: CVE-2022-2152|2024-08-03T00:24:44.254Z -- unknown -- duplicate%20page%20and%20post
item.description: The Duplicate Page and Post WordPress plugin before 2.8 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
